stories.original_headline: This popular diet was linked to a much lower stroke risk
stories.original_summary: A long-term study found that women who closely followed a Mediterranean diet had a much lower risk of stroke. The strongest benefits were seen in women who ate more plant-based foods, fish, and olive oil while cutting back on red meat and saturated fats. Their risk dropped across all major stroke ty
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Feast Lowers Risk of Dreadful Ailment!
stories.fantasy_story: Healers of the Sunstone Isles have discovered that women following their special eating regimen are much less likely to suffer from a sudden, dreadful ailment. Those who favored greens, sea-catch, and sacred oils, while shunning heavy meats, found the greatest protection. This ancient wisdom guards against many woes.

stories.original_headline: Scientists were wrong for decades about DNA knots
stories.original_summary: Scientists have discovered that DNA behaves in a surprising way when squeezed through tiny nanopores, overturning a long-held assumption in genetics research. What researchers once thought were knots causing messy electrical signals turn out to be something else entirely: twisted coils called plecto
stories.fantasy_story: For many decades, the Alchemists of the Life Arts believed the vital essences, when pushed through enchanted narrow passages, would form snarls. Now, they've found these are not random knots, but instead tightly wound magical braids. This new understanding sheds light on the very fabric of life.

stories.original_headline: Google’s Pixel 9A is back down to $349, its cheapest price so far
stories.original_summary: The Pixel 9A is an incredible phone that’s worth hopping on while it’s $349 for the 128GB version in blue, black, or pink at Amazon and Best Buy. It’s discounted ahead of the new Pixel 10A, for which Google will open pre-orders on February 18. That’s also when the company will share more details reg
stories.fantasy_headline: Glimmering Scrying Orb, Model 9A, Now at its Lowest Price!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Guild of Glimmering Orbs has announced a special boon! Their wondrous Scrying Orb, Model 9A, can now be acquired for only 349 Gold Coins from the Merchant Caravans or Grand Bazaars. This special offer arrives before the new Model 10A is unveiled, for which advance pledges will soon open.

stories.original_headline: Leaked specs for Sony’s next flagship wireless earbuds reveal ANC upgrades
stories.original_summary: Following images of Sony's new WF-1000XM6 earbuds shared by a retailer last week ahead of an official announcement, reliable leaker billbil-kun has revealed what they're claiming are the full specs and new features of the company's next flagship buds. The WF-1000XM6 will be powered by a new QN3e pro
stories.fantasy_headline: Whispers of New Sonic Ear-Gems Reveal Stronger Silence Spells!
stories.fantasy_story: Secret runes detailing the Clan of Sonic Weavers' newest Whispering Ear-Gems, the WF-1000XM6, have been deciphered. These enchanted artifacts promise even greater silence enchantments, allowing wearers to escape the loudest of market squares. A new powerful core crystal is said to fuel their magic.
